channel.title: Entrepreneurship on N9O
channel.description: Recent content in Entrepreneurship on N9O

item.title: Execution is King
item.description: As a Product Manager, more often than not, I notice people mixing up ideas and execution in discussions. Both when choosing evaluating new initiatives to bet on and when evaluating what is happening in their industry.

item.title: Product-Market Fit: What it is and do you have it
item.description: In the fast-paced and competitive world of entrepreneurship, achieving product-market fit (PMF) is the holy grail. It is the moment when a product or service aligns perfectly with the needs and desires of the target market, leading to enthusiastic customer adoption and sustainable growth. But how do entrepreneurs know if they have truly achieved this elusive state?

item.title: Blitzscaling
item.description: Blitzscaling is a term coined by entrepreneur and investor Reid Hoffman, which refers to a strategy for rapidly scaling up a company in a short period. The idea behind blitzscaling is to prioritize growth over profitability, aiming to dominate a market and become a category leader. While blitzscaling can lead to significant success for companies, it also has some significant downsides.
